name: Monstermonial Agency
description:
Even monsters deserve to fall in love.

You are the new employee of the renowned Monstermonial Agency. Your mission is to find the perfect match for monsters looking for their soulmate. Read their files, analyze their answers, guess their personalities, and play Cupid by creating couples! But be careful, as we say: "Better to be alone than in bad company... or worse, devoured".

10 monster breeds with 24 hand-drawn illustrations
 4 possible outcomes for each couple you make, including cannibalism...
 A scoring system where you have to find the best possible combinations
 A dynamic event system that enables bonuses & maluses
 All you need to play is your mouse!

This game was made for Global Game Jam 2022. Theme: Duality

Diversifiers: 

 Take A Break - Each member of the team has to take at least one break every 2-3 hours.
 Stick Together - Make a game that revolves around grouping characters or objects.
 Everyone is a Creator - At least one of your collaborators has to be someone who is not involved in games or game design at all. Their contribution to the game must be significant, or at the very least not a tokenistic throw-away gag.

Thank you to Romain "Osbern" Le Leydour for his wonderful cameo!
